sections.heading: Introduction
paragraphs: Deploying a Gitlab runner using kubernetes is a great option to overcome the limitations of other gitlab runner executor such as docker and docker machine.

sections.heading: Running Gitlab Runner container pod in gitlab namespace
paragraphs: Copy the deployment definition in file named gitlab-runner-deploy.yaml file. Replace the environment variable name CI_SERVER_URL, REGISTRATION_TOKEN. The key value in registration-token is an base64 value of the runner registration token.
Execute below command to create the gitlab runner container pod.

sections.heading: Authorization
paragraphs: Executing the pipeline now would fail, as the pod would require permissions to create the pipeline container within the gitlab name space. The gitlab document provides the role based authorization definition.
